Commands.Auto Crossbow: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack.  Deals more damage if target is a machine.  Inflicts Sap debuff on all enemies if STR 55 Passive Ability if equipped.
Commands.Drill: 2-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Inflicts Small Defense Down and deals more damage if target is a machine.  Inflicts Small Max BRV Down as well if STR 60 Passive Ability if equipped.
Commands.BRV Attack+: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Lasts for 4 turns after using Drill.
Commands.Chainsaw: 5-HIT BRV+HP attack.  BRV stolen from the target can overflow up to 120% of Max BRV.  Deals higher damage if target is a machine.  Grants Machinery for 6 turns.  Machinery raises BRV damage dealt based on the number of debuffs on the target.

Passives.Auto Crossbow Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Auto Crossbow.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Drill Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Drill.
Passives.BRV Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Auto Crossbow Charge: Increases the max uses of Auto Crossbow by 1.
Passives.Debuff Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Drill Charge: Increases the max uses of Drill by 1.
Passives.Marshal of the Machine Divison: Slightly raises Attack for 2 turns when using an HP attack on a Machine-type enemy.
Passives.Focus Attack: Raises BRV damage dealt to a single target with AoE attacks by 1.6
Passives.Auto Crossbow Extend: Increases Auto Bowgun's max uses by 2.Slightly raises its potency and lowers its Action Delay.Moderately raises its potency when used against Machine-type targets.Inflicts Sap debuff to all targets for 4 turns.
Passives.Debuff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Drill Extend: Greatly raises Drill's potency and lowers its Action Delay.Moderately raises its potency when used against Machine-type targets.Slightly improves its Defense Down debuff.Inflicts Small Max BRV Down as well.

Weapons.Partisan CP: 35: Increases the potency of Drill and lowers its Action Delay.Increases the potency of Defense Down and extends its duration.Grants Small Attack Up for 4 turns.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ (Increases its potency and deals more damage to Machines).
Weapons.Trident CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Chainsaw.
Weapons.Mythril Spear CP: 15: Increases the potency of Auto Crossbow and lowers its Action Delay.Grants Small Max BRV Up and Small Speed Up for 4 turns.
Weapons.Schwarz Lance CP: 15: Slightly raises all party members' Max BRV and Attack when an enemy is debuffed.
